title: How to watch Wonder Woman 1984 online: stream WW84 anywhere right now
author: james-laird
summary: Gal Gadot back for DC's superb superhero sequel
article: The dynamic duo of Gal Gadot and Patty Jenkins are back, teaming up again for DC's superhero sequel Wonder Woman 1984. The follow up to 2017's first Wonder Woman film, WW84 sees Gadot reprise her fantastic performance as Diana Price - aka Wonder Woman. Read on as we explain how to watch Wonder Woman 1984 online and stream the full WW84 movie wherever you are in the world right now.

Having premiered online last Christmas, it's now available on PVOD platforms for at-home streaming - but only in select countries like the UK and Canada. In some major markets, particularly the US where it recently left the country's HBO Max streaming service, it can now only be watched in cinemas - and not everyone might feel safe doing that.

Fortunately, there's ways to watch wherever you are in the world, as we're about to explain - and who wouldn't want to? A stellar supporting cast features Chris Pine, Kristen Wiig, Pedro Pascal, Robin Wright and Connie Nielsen - many of them also returnees from the original.

We don't want to spoil Wonder Woman 1984 for you, so all we'll say is that the new movie sees Diana taking on two all-new foes in Max Lord and The Cheetah - and that the production values are every bit as fantastic as you'd expect from a DC effort. Its reception has been largely positive, too - certainly good enough to get Wonder Woman 3 greenlit.

Filming locations, you ask? Global capitals Washington D.C. and London, England are two of the main spots, with Spain's Andalusia and Canary Islands regions adding to the movie's stunning backdrops. In other words, breathtaking.

So if you find yourself outside a country currently allowing you to go to the movies or would simply rather stay home to see the next DC instalment, read on as we explain how to watch Wonder Woman 1984 online and stream WW84 wherever you are in the world right now.
If you're away from home right now, you can still watch Wonder Woman 1984 no matter where you’ve ended up.

In some places, cinematic releases are still going ahead or being prioritized again - such as the US, where WW84 is now only in movie theaters and no longer available to stream online, no matter how deep your pockets are.
In others, like the UK and Canada, it's available on PVOD (premium video on-demand platforms) so you can rent or buy it for about the same as you'd pay for a movie ticket.
When this is the case and you're traveling, you can still watch all the same services you would at home wherever you are - you just need to download a VPN to do so.
Use a VPN to watch Wonder Woman 1984 online from anywhere
